name: weightlifting_tracker
description: MVP: { This project will create a site that allows users to track their progress in weightlifting and powerlifting. The site will track daily, weekly, and monthly progress on basic lifts, and recommend a program based on the user's stated goal (strength maintenance, general strength, powerlifting, Olympic lifting) and current rate of progress.     What I know how to do:         1. Create a database in SQL or Mongo for each user, update each database, add to each database         2. Create a database of programs that are associated with different user goals and rates of progress     What I need to know how to do:         1. Use data to calculate rate of progress and store this as an dynamic object that updates automatically when the user adds to their progress database         2. Get functions that calculate 1 rep max for any given number of reps, add that number to the database as a 1RM snapshot value
